title: VELCRO Brand Adhesive Dots White 500 Pk 3/4" Circles Sticky Back Round Hook and Loop for School, Teachers, Mounting Arts and Crafts | VEL-30077-AMS
description: Hook-and-loop fasteners feature a permanent, self-adhesive backing to attach immediately and securely onto a variety of surfaces. Its durable, Velcro construction provides reliable use both indoors and outdoors. Strong holding power supports up to 5 lb. Easy-to-use design requires you to simply peel the tape from the fastener and press it firmly into place. Fasteners are perfect for painted wallboard, glass, metal, most plastics and more.
